Blog Section with Article Previews.Layout: Grid layout displaying article previews in a multi-column format, with each article having an image and a content overlay.
Blog Section with Article Previews.Design: Visually engaging with a mix of images and text. Each article preview features a hover effect to draw attention.

Key Elements.Header: Centered header with a section title and description.
Key Elements.Article Previews: Grid layout with responsive columns (up to four columns in larger screens) featuring individual articles.
Key Elements.Article Content: Each article has an image with overlay text including a date, title, and a 'Read more' link.
Key Elements.Hover Effect: Images scale slightly upon hover for a dynamic feel.

Blog Section with Article Previews.Use Cases: Ideal for blogs, news websites, and any platform that regularly publishes articles or updates, providing a snapshot of the latest content.
